resources.string: To find a place where elegance and history meet, Seek the charm of the past with flavors so sweet. Downtown you will wonder, where time takes a bow, In the heart of Fayetteville, circa then is now.
Follow the scent of sugar and delight, where every color paints a treat, on a downtown street.
In downtowns embrace, where history and luxury entwine, discover a feast set around the year 1800 divine.
Whether you dine under the stars or inside with style, circa a historic time, your taste buds will smile.
Where art are meets sugar and cakes are a prize, downtown holds a sweet surprise.
Seek the spot to shop where colorful macaroons and creamy cheesecake combine, a downtown delight that is artistic and fine.
Opps! This is not the place! Hurry, hurry, time is ticking!
Congratulations! You solved all the clues, and have found the Downtown Fayetteville Market House

Circa 1800 has been serving Fayetteville in the downtown area for more than 15 years. Known for their upscale cuisine in a relaxed atmosphere, it is great place to celebrate special occasions or just enjoy an afternoon meal.

The Sweet Palette serving dessert and decor to the surrounding downtown Fayetteville area! Known for their mouthwatering, homemade, fresh cupcakes, cakes, and confections this warm bakery has a beautiful restored dine-in to enjoy coffee, cake, or just a good time with good friends!
